definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
The Merchant of Venice by William Shakespeare

sentences.english: Many of the Parsee merchants have made great fortunes there by dealing in cotton;
sentences.chinese: 很多帕西商人在印度作棉花生意發了大財。

sentences.english: They probably arrived in the United States with settlers and traders from Europe.
sentences.chinese: 它們可能是與定居者和商人一起從歐洲來到美國的。

sentences.english: The merchants realized that it was important to expand the clan influence if they wanted to get wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 商人認識到擴大宗族勢力與自身致富有直接的關係。

sentences.english: Prevarication is one of the techniques the businessman prefers to employ.
sentences.chinese: 搪塞是這個商人喜歡使用的技巧之一。

sentences.english: There's a businessman named Rob in one of my classes.
sentences.chinese: 有一位叫做羅勃的商人跟我修同一門課。

sentences.english: Astute salesmen know how to invest emotionally.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人懂得如何感情投資。

sentences.english: Some local businessmen proposed to raise a comfort fund for the earthquake victims.
sentences.chinese: 當地一些商人提議向地震受害者籌集撫卹金。

sentences.english: A sagacious businessman seldom fails in his business.
sentences.chinese: 精明的商人在生意上很少失敗。

sentences.english: As a small businessperson you have no greater leverage than the truth.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個小商人，誠實是最大的優勢。

sentences.english: He bragged that his father was the most successful businessman in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他吹噓他父親是本市最成功的商人。

sentences.english: The merchants lied at a caravanserai that night.
sentences.chinese: 商人們那天晚上在商隊旅館過夜。

sentences.english: Many merchants were not slow to cash in on the current China craze.
sentences.chinese: 許多商人都急於在流行的中國熱中撈一把。

sentences.english: All the while, making both foreign and Chinese traders very wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 這讓外國和中國的商人大發橫財。

sentences.english: Singapore's Whampoa Road was named in memory of which businessman?
sentences.chinese: 新加坡黃埔路是爲了紀念哪一位商人而命名的？

sentences.english: The space is dotted with various types of houses and tradesman 's workshops with their messy yards.
sentences.chinese: 其間還點綴着各種住宅和商人的店鋪和各式院子。

sentences.english: A decade of growth has also given Africa's business people a new élan.
sentences.chinese: 十年經濟增長讓非洲商人有了新的活力。

definition: to buy and sell/to do business/to trade/to deal
to trade/to carry out commercial activities/in business
